author: archyde
title: star of David and risk on a professor's door – - Archyde
text: This morning, on the door of the room of a professor on the College of Legislation of the College of Florence, an engraving of a Star of David accompanied by a threatening writing was found. The episode, reported to the competent authorities, “arouses profound indignation”, writes the College in a press release. «Your complete group of the Division of Authorized Sciences and the College of Legislation condemns the very critical gesture which takes us again to the darkest years of current European historical past and warns us of the necessity to firmly monitor any resurgence of anti-Semitism – we learn within the observe launched from the College – It isn’t acceptable that the worldwide scenario is used as a pretext to gas demonstrations of this sort. The Division and the College are dedicated to intensifying their presence and actions in selling a tradition of coexistence that respects the values of democratic pluralism”. One more shameful episode of anti-Semitism that has taken place because the outbreak of the warfare between Israel and Hamas in Gaza. #star #David #risk #professors #door #Tempo 2024-05-24 20:24:00 Related posts: Tourist attractions in Vung Tau city are clean and pure on Tet holiday | Destination Gloria Reyes affirms card fraud case Supérate "was closed" Turkey's Parliamentary Recess Delays Sweden's NATO Membership Ratification: Updates & Analysis Green Agriculture Subsidies: Impact on Environmental Protection - Exclusive Insights for Subscribers Russia announces the death of another general of its army | The World | D.W.
